definition: to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Action figures and games & puzzles saw increases of four per cent and one per cent.
sentences.chinese: 动画人物和游戏及拼图看到了百分之百分之一4增加。

sentences.english: Radar data gridding and cinrad mosaic has significance in meteorological service.
sentences.chinese: 雷达资料的网格化及拼图在气象业务中有重要的意义。

sentences.english: My fatherwon the game. Then I played Scrabble.
Remember that number puzzle craze a couple of years back?
sentences.chinese: 还记得风靡一时的数字拼图游戏吗？

sentences.english: No, I guess Rosebud is just a… piece in a jigsaw puzzle… a missing piece.
sentences.chinese: 我猜，玫瑰花蕾也许就是拼图上的一块，遗失的一块。

sentences.english: Click that button, then click the green jigsaw puzzle piece.
sentences.chinese: 单击这个按钮，然后再单击这个绿色的拼图块。

sentences.english: The police issued an identikit picture of the mugger.
sentences.chinese: 警察印发出其不意行凶抢劫者的形象拼图。

sentences.english: It's the picture of our class.
sentences.chinese: 这张拼图是我们班的大合照。

sentences.english: The coming on-board of Derek Fisher was a critical piece in the puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 费舍尔的到来是构成拼图的关键一步。

sentences.english: There are several reasons for that – it’s a puzzle with many pieces.
sentences.chinese: 降级有好几个原因，就像拼图有好多拼板那样。

sentences.english: 'We're all piece of a puzzle that fit together.'
sentences.chinese: 我们都是一副拼图里的一部分。

sentences.english: The present invention discloses a kind of edible candy paper with picture arrangement function.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种具有拼图功能的可食用糖纸。

sentences.english: Imagine the database change management process as a set of interlocking puzzle pieces.
sentences.chinese: 将数据库变更管理过程想象成一套彼此相连的拼图。

sentences.english: It's like two hales of a puzzle come together.
sentences.chinese: 这就像拼图的两半被放在了一起。

sentences.english: Jack loves jigsaw puzzles. He is trying to fit two pieces together.
sentences.chinese: 杰克喜欢拼图案游戏，他正想把两个小拼图拼在一起。

definition: to put sth together from component parts
toy figurine/action figure/stuffed animal/doll/(fig.) sb's plaything
